scripts.build: cd ./packages/chonky-icon-fontawesome && npm run build && cd ../chonky && npm run build
scripts.release:version: npm version patch -m "release: v%s" --no-git-tag-version && npm version patch -m "release: v%s" --no-git-tag-version --workspace=packages/chonky && npm version patch -m "release: v%s" --no-git-tag-version --workspace=packages/chonky-icon-fontawesome
scripts.release:version:minor: npm version minor -m "release: v%s" --no-git-tag-version && npm version minor -m "release: v%s" --no-git-tag-version --workspace=packages/chonky && npm version minor -m "release: v%s" --no-git-tag-version --workspace=packages/chonky-icon-fontawesome
scripts.release:commit: git reset && git add package.json packages/chonky/package.json packages/chonky-icon-fontawesome/package.json && git commit -s -m "release: v$npm_package_version" && git tag v$npm_package_version
scripts.release:publish: git push && git push --tags && npm run build && cd packages/chonky-icon-fontawesome && npm publish && cd ../chonky && npm publish
scripts.release: npm run release:version && npm run release:commit
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:version:minor && npm run release:commit
